name: maccy-clipboard-mcp
description: Access and search your Maccy clipboard history
long_description: This MCP server provides tools to access, search, and manage your Maccy clipboard history. Query recent items, search by content or application, and get detailed clipboard statistics. All data stays local on your machine.

tools.name: search_clipboard
tools.description: Search clipboard history by text pattern or regex with advanced filtering

tools.name: get_recent_items
tools.description: Get recent clipboard items with optional filters and image support

tools.name: copy_to_clipboard
tools.description: Copy a specific history item back to current clipboard

tools.name: pin_item
tools.description: Pin a clipboard item for persistence

tools.name: export_history
tools.description: Export clipboard data in JSON/CSV/TXT formats

tools.name: get_clipboard_stats
tools.description: Get clipboard usage statistics and analytics

tools.name: get_items_by_app
tools.description: Get clipboard items from specific application with image support
